text: Kawdut, United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency is a large village in Ye Township in Mawlamyine District in the Mon State of south-east Myanmar. Kawdut is on the coastal plain about west of Lamaing.Burma 1:250,000 topographic map, Series U542, ND 47-02 Ye U.S. Army Map Service, December 1959 The Kawdut Ferry is about 1.7 km north-west of the village on the Kawdut Chaung. ==Notes== ==External links== * "Kawdut Map — Satellite Images of Kawdut" Maplandia World Gazetteer Category:Populated places in Mon State
title: Kawdut
